testcase.name: Verify the page title on Products page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Sauce Demo login page.....................................passed When I enter username "standard_user".......................................passed And I enter password "secret_sauce".........................................passed And I click on the login button.............................................passed Then I should be redirected to the Products page with title "Products"......passed Given I am on the Products page.............................................passed Then the page title should be "Products"....................................passed

testcase.name: Add a product to the shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Sauce Demo login page.....................................passed When I enter username "standard_user".......................................passed And I enter password "secret_sauce".........................................passed And I click on the login button.............................................passed Then I should be redirected to the Products page with title "Products"......passed Given I am on the Products page.............................................passed When I add the product with name "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart..........passed Then the product should be added to the cart................................passed And the cart should display 1 item..........................................passed
